mapper.insert: insert into point (member_id, member_point_savepoint, member_point_savedetail, member_point_savedate) values (#{member_id}, #{member_point_savepoint}, #{member_point_savedetail}, #{member_point_savedate})
insert into point (member_id, member_point_usepoint, member_point_usedetail, member_point_usedate) values (#{member_id}, #{member_point_usepoint}, #{member_point_usedetail}, #{member_point_usedate})
mapper.select: select greatest(member_point_savepoint, member_point_usepoint), member_point_usedate || member_point_savedate, member_point_usedetail || member_point_savedetail from point where member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY member_point_usedate || member_point_savedate desc
mapper.update: update member m set m.member_donation = (select sum(p.member_point_usepoint) from point p where member_point_usedetail = '기부') where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_point_usepoint, member_point_usedate, member_point_usedetail from point where member_id = #{member_id} and member_point_usedetail = '기부' order by member_point_usedate desc
select member_point_usedetail, count(*) from point where member_point_usedetail = '기부' and member_id = #{member_id} group by member_point_usedetail

select.if: select member_point_usepoint, to_char(member_point_usedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as member_point_usedate , member_point_usedetail from point where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM member_point_usedate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sysdate) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM member_point_usedate) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sysdate) AND member_id = #{member_id}

select member_id ,member_point_usepoint, to_char(member_point_usedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as member_point_usedate, member_point_usedetail from point where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM member_point_usedate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sysdate) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM member_point_usedate) = (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sysdate)-1) AND member_id = #{member_id}

select member_point_usepoint, to_char(member_point_usedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as member_point_usedate, member_point_usedetail from point where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM member_point_usedate) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM sysdate) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM member_point_usedate) = (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sysdate)-2) AND member_id = #{member_id}
